name: RadQuest
description:
Evil robots are attacking the town! Bo "Rad" Radley has to defeat them in order to get lunch!

- Arrow keys to move and jump

- Space bar shoots your Rad Beam

- Holding Up as you're descending will slow you down.

- Shooting while jumping will retain your momentum, but shooting while on the ground will grind you to a halt. It's not a bug, it's a feature.

(This game suffers from being ill planned. It's our first jam and first Game Maker game too.)

Credits:

Sparg - Programming

Ezzy Mourão - Everything else
